summary: Get ready to make the dragonclaws useful, beside using them as a one-off key!
descriptionHtml:
Requested by budhaber, here: http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/625274-dragon-claw-keys-as-weapons/page__gopid__4963288#entry4963288

Description
===========
This little mod will enable you to turn those good-for-one-thing dragonclaws into weapons through smithing!
They are ranked according to skyrims\'s weapon materials and each subsequent material is better than the previous one.
Beware though, once they\'re converted to weapons, there\'s no way to turn them back. Choose wisely!

From V2 onward, this mod will contain Kobayashi345\'s \"Not really HD\" textures.
These are a massive improvement over the vanilla textures! Dont forget to thank him.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3167

Location
========
Craftable at any forgeif you have a claw, an additional item and the correct smithing perk.

Install
=======
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary.
3. Copy files to (install folder)\\Skyrim\\Data\\
4. Start Nexus mod manager, place a checkmark beside DragonclawWeaponry.esp.

OR

1. Start Nexus mod manager
2. Go to the \"Mods\" tab
3. Click \"Add mod from file\" (the puzzle piece with a +, near the upper left corner)
4. Select Dragonclaw weapons.7z
5. Find the mod in your modlist, and activate it (the puzzle piece with a green arrow, near the upper left corner)

Uninstall
=========
1. Deactivate the mod using the Nexus mod manager (\"Mods\" tab, then the puzzle piece with the red arrow, near the upper left corner)
2. Delete the mod using the red \"X\" near the upper left corner.

Incompatibility
===============
None known so far.

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
It might be impossible to convert the gold claw unless you handed it back to the owner. (so it might require the illegal re-acquisition of the claw :) )

History
=======
28-03-2012:
V2 - Kobayashi345\'s textures included
V2 - Ranked the claws according to skyrim\'s weapon materials
V2 - Better claws now require higher smithing perks.
27-03-2012:
V1 - Initial release

Contact
=======
Right here on the Nexus.

Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to The Nexus.com for the great service they provide.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.
Thanks to Kobayashi345 for letting me use his \"Not really HD claws\" mod.


Tools Used
==========
7-Zip - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=15579
Blender - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=12248
NIFSkope - http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

Licensing/Legal
===============
You must contact me and obtain my permission before re-packaging any part of
this mod. If I do not respond within 2 weeks, you are free to use it as you see fit, on the condition that you do give credit where it is due. 

Related
===============
Looking for a fancy weapon to include in your new mod?
Look no further! Check out my
[img]http://i.imgur.com/w43aI.png[/img]
No permission needed, models and textures included in every download!
author: Urwy
